hero.title: Advanced Medical Imaging in Oran
hero.description: The Nelson Mandela Medical Diagnostics Center offers high-quality medical imaging services with state-of-the-art equipment and an experienced medical team.
hero.imageAlt: Modern medical imaging room with MRI

about.title: About Our Center
about.subtitle: Leading medical and radiological expertise serving patients and healthcare professionals in Oran.

career.title: Professional Experience
career.description: Our center is staffed with experienced radiologists with over 20 years of practice in diagnostic and interventional medical imaging. Our specialists have trained at the most prestigious medical schools.

education.title: Training and Specializations
education.education1: Doctorate in Medicine, University of Algiers
education.education2: Specialization in Diagnostic and Interventional Radiology
education.education3: Advanced training in MRI and multi-slice CT
education.education4: Expertise in Osteoarticular and Neurological Imaging

affiliations.title: Commitments and Affiliations
affiliations.description: Our doctors are active members of the Algerian Society of Radiology and the French Society of Radiology. They regularly participate in international conferences to stay at the forefront of technological advances in medical imaging.

years.title: Years of Experience
years.description: In-depth expertise at the service of your health.

patients.title: Patients Treated
patients.description: A trust established among patients in Oran.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: The Nelson Mandela Medical Center offers a complete range of medical imaging examinations performed with state-of-the-art equipment.
services.appointmentButton: Book an appointment for an exam

irm.title: MRI
irm.description: Magnetic Resonance Imaging provides precise images of organs and soft tissues without radiation. Ideal for exploring the brain, spine, and joints.
irm.equipment: Latest generation 3 Tesla MRI offering exceptional image quality and reduced examination time.

scanner.title: CT Scan
scanner.description: CT scanning provides cross-sectional images of the body with excellent resolution. Particularly suitable for examining the chest, abdomen, and pelvis.
scanner.equipment: 128-slice CT scanner allowing rapid acquisitions and high-precision 3D reconstruction.

ultrasound.title: Ultrasound
ultrasound.description: Ultrasound uses sound waves to visualize internal organs. Non-invasive and radiation-free, it is ideal for examining soft tissues, vessels, and pregnancy monitoring.
ultrasound.equipment: High-definition ultrasound machines with color Doppler modules and specific probes for each anatomical region.

radiography.title: Radiography
radiography.description: Standard radiography provides images of the skeleton and thorax. It is used to diagnose fractures, lung conditions, and certain bone diseases.
radiography.equipment: Digital radiography system (DR) allowing instant acquisition and low radiation dose.

mammography.title: Mammography
mammography.description: Mammography is a radiological examination dedicated to breast study. It is essential for early detection of breast cancer and exploration of breast abnormalities.
mammography.equipment: Digital mammography with tomosynthesis allowing 3D visualization and improved detection of lesions.

biopsy.title: Image-guided biopsy
biopsy.description: This technique allows tissue samples to be taken under ultrasound or CT guidance for pathological analysis, offering an accurate diagnosis with minimal intervention.
biopsy.equipment: High-precision guidance systems with single-use sterile biopsy kits for optimal safety.

equipment.title: Our Technology
equipment.subtitle: The Nelson Mandela Medical Center constantly invests in cutting-edge equipment to offer the best possible diagnostic care.
equipment.imageAlt: Modern medical equipment in our center

mri.title: 3 Tesla MRI
mri.description: Our high magnetic field MRI offers exceptionally precise images with reduced examination times for greater comfort.

scanner.title: 128-slice CT Scanner
scanner.description: Our multi-slice CT scanner enables ultra-fast acquisitions and high-definition 3D reconstructions with minimal radiation.

ultrasound.title: Doppler Ultrasound
ultrasound.description: Our high-resolution ultrasound devices incorporate the latest technologies for precise imaging of organs and vessels.

commitment.title: Our Technological Commitment
commitment.description: The Nelson Mandela Medical Center is committed to providing optimal imaging quality while respecting the ALARA principle (As Low As Reasonably Achievable) to minimize radiation exposure.

points.point2: Continuous training of the technical team
points.point3: Optimized protocols for each type of examination

appointment.title: Book an Appointment
appointment.subtitle: Schedule your radiological examination easily and quickly with our appointment booking system.

form.title: Appointment Request Form
form.prescription: Do you have a medical prescription?
form.required: Required fields. Our team will contact you within 24 business hours to confirm your appointment.

address.title: Address
address.content: 123 Mohammed V Boulevard, City Center, Oran, Algeria

location.title: Location
location.description: Located in downtown Oran, our center is easily accessible by public transport and has private parking for our patients.

success.title: Request sent
success.message: Your appointment request has been successfully sent. We will contact you as soon as possible.

error.title: Error
error.message: An error occurred while sending your request. Please try again or contact us by phone.

doctorPortal.title: Doctor Portal
doctorPortal.subtitle: A secure portal dedicated to healthcare professionals to access their patients' examination results.

collaboration.title: Medical Collaboration
collaboration.description: The Nelson Mandela Medical Center provides referring physicians with secure access to view images and reports of their patients.

feature1.title: Instant access to results
feature1.description: View your patients' radiological examinations as soon as they are validated.

feature2.title: Medical image visualization
feature2.description: Access high-resolution images with advanced visualization tools.

feature3.title: Report downloads
feature3.description: Download reports in PDF format and images in DICOM format.

feature4.title: Secure communication
feature4.description: Communicate confidentially with our radiological team.

doctorPortal.access: To obtain your login credentials, please contact our medical secretariat with your professional information.

preview.title: Doctor portal preview
preview.description: Our picture archiving and communication system allows you to access radiological examinations from any device.

news.title: News and Health Tips
news.subtitle: Stay informed about the latest news from the center and discover our tips for taking care of your health.
news.noNews: No news available at the moment.
news.noTips: No health tips available at the moment.

testimonials.title: What Our Patients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Discover testimonials from patients who have benefited from our medical imaging services.

testimonial1.text: I was very anxious about having an MRI, but the team at the Nelson Mandela Center was exceptional. They took the time to explain the procedure to me and were very kind. The exam went very well.
testimonial1.name: Sarah B.

testimonial2.text: As a physician, I particularly appreciate the quality of the images and the accuracy of the reports provided by the Nelson Mandela Center. The doctor portal is also very convenient for quickly accessing my patients' results.
testimonial2.name: Dr. Karim M.

testimonial3.text: I appreciated how quickly I was able to get an appointment and the punctuality of the team. The premises are modern and pleasant, and the staff is very professional. I highly recommend this imaging center.
testimonial3.name: Rachid L.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Don't hesitate to contact us for any questions or requests for additional information.
